caption.p: Spatial distributions of the sea surface temperature (SST) anomalies. Similar to Fig. 6, ( a) shows the results from NCEP reanalysis data, while ( b– p) shows the simulated results from the 15 models. The absolute SST anomalies were calculated as the composites of both the positive anomalies and negative anomalies (taking the absolute values). Nodes with stronger absolute SST anomalies are marked by dark red color. The figure is generated using Ferret (version6.9, http://ferret.pmel.noaa.gov/Ferret/documentation/release-notes/version-6-9-release-notes).
